description: Quickly get color inspiration with our AI color palette generator
title: Color Wheel - get color ideas for your logo, illustration or web design
introduction: Colorgraph is a tool for image processing that provides functions for quantizing, getting connectivity matrix, and colorizing images.
features: Quantize images to reduce the number of colors
Get connectivity matrix for quantized images

faqs.question: What is colorgraph?
faqs.answer: Colorgraph is a tool for image processing that provides functions for quantizing, getting connectivity matrix, and colorizing images.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: No, there is no free trial available for Colorgraph.
